NAME

SYNOPSIS

DESCRIPTION

returns the process ID of the calling process. The ID is guaranteed to be unique and is useful for constructing temporary file names. returns the process ID of the parent of the calling process.

ERRORS

The and functions are always successful, and no return value is reserved to indicate an error.
